item.title: An Image is Worth 32 Tokens for Reconstruction and Generation
item.description: Image generation gets a speed boost with TiTok, a novel 1D image tokenizer that uses just 32 tokens for high-quality image reconstruction and generation, achieving up to 410x faster processing than st…

item.title: PaDeLLM-NER: Parallel Decoding in Large Language Models for Named Entity Recognition
item.description: PaDeLLM-NER massively accelerates LLM-based NER inference by up to 10x, enabling near real-time performance without accuracy loss.
